item.title: Modern Family S01E12 영어 표현
item.author: Author
item.description: 1. old ball and chain one’s wife. - Jay: So, trouble in gay paradise, huh? - Mitchell: He just can’t say no to anybody who needs help. And why do you have to always add the word “gay” where it doesn’t belong? - Jay: Hey, hey, you’re not mad at me. You’re mad at the old balls and chain.

item.title: Modern Family S01E11 영어 표현
item.author: Author
item.description: 1. by all means 물론, 분명히. - Phil: By all means, Claire, we want you looking your sexiest when the hunky, gay firemen get here! 2. pool 포켓볼(여러 색깔의 공 16개로 하는 당구 비슷한 게임. 흔히 pub이나 bar에서 함)

item.title: Modern Family S01E10 영어 표현
item.author: Author
item.description: 1. rub one’s nose in something 남에게 달갑지 않은 체험을 시키다, …에게 그 사람이 잘못한 일을 생각나게 하다, 이미 일어난 잘못된 일이나 불운한 일을 …에게 상기시키다(동물을 집에

item.title: Modern Family S01E09 영어 표현
item.author: Author
item.description: 1. throw 비격식 [VN] 충격을 주다, 당혹스럽게[놀라게] 하다. - Manny: I need your advice, Jay. - Jay: Really? - Manny: She’s gonna be at Luke’s party. - Jay: Well, I’m a little thrown. I mean, you don’t usually come to me for advice. 2. tanked To do badly or at it, or fail.

item.title: Modern Family S01E08 영어 표현
item.author: Author
item.description: 1. raise the roof (어떤 건물 안에서) …이 떠나가게 떠들어 대다[함성을 지르다 등]. - Cameron: Ooh, raise the roof, Lily. 2. kick off (~을) 시작하다. - Claire: Wait a minute. You- You thought the coupons were your only present? Are you kidding

item.title: Modern Family S01E07 영어 표현
item.author: Author
item.description: 1. drop the ball (책임지고 있는 일을) 실수로 망치다. - Phil: And then, uh, I guess that leaves Luke. We dropped the ball a little on that one. - Claire: Yeah, a little bit. 2. panties on a bunch When someone acts in an anal-retentive manner, and makes a big fuss out of a relatively minor problem. -

item.title: Modern Family S01E05 영어 표현
item.author: Author
item.description: 1. be torn (between A and B) (A와 B 사이에서) 갈피를 잡지 못하다[어쩔 줄을 모르다]. - Jay: You’re not leaving, are you? - Mitchell: You know, there’s kind of a lot of drama. - Cameron: So we’re torn.

item.title: Modern Family S01E04 영어 표현
item.author: Author
item.description: 1. pull a fast one To deceive someone. - Jay: Listen, I would love to get this thing behind us, but Gloria would never forgive me if I pulled a fast one on her. That’s why you’re goning to pull a fast one on her, and I’m not going to like it one bit. 2. spring 갑자기 알리다[발언하다](a

item.title: How I Met Your Mother S09E24 영어 표현
item.author: Author
item.description: 1. rsvp (초대장에서) 회답 주시기 바랍니다(프랑스어 répondez s’il vous plaît(please reply)를 줄인 것). - Ted: You rsvp’d no.

item.title: How I Met Your Mother S09E23 영어 표현
item.author: Author
item.description: 1. too rich for one’s blood Too expensive or fancy to suit one’s taste or preferences. - Lily: So the only way you’re allowed to hook up with her is if you marry her. - Barney: Too rich for my blood. 2. great Scott An interjection of surprise, amazement, or dismay. - Barney: You still dating that guy? (놀라는 표정) Great scotch!
